Post._content:
# [](http://kwaibook.com) WordPressHexo WordPress 1. 2. HexoMD 3. 4. 5. Hexo MDGithubTravis [next](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/getting-started.html) [butterfly](https://butterfly.js.org/posts/ceeb73f/) * [Travis CI](https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000021987832) * [Hexo](https://kchen.cc/2016/11/12/hexo-instructions/) # 1. hexo new post $title 2. hexo new draft $title 3. source\_posts 4. source\images 5. https://typora.io/ markdown 6. [Markdown](https://markdown.com.cn/basic-syntax/links.html) 7. [](http://blog.smallerpig.com/set-hexo-show-more-button-on-indexpage.html) 9. [](https://tohugo.com/2021/01/26/%E5%B7%A5%E5%85%B7%E9%85%8D%E7%BD%AE/Hexo%E6%B7%BB%E5%8A%A0%E5%88%86%E7%B1%BB%E5%8F%8A%E6%A0%87%E7%AD%BE%EF%BC%88%E5%9C%A8Next%E4%B8%BB%E9%A2%98%E4%B8%8B%EF%BC%89/) 9. [met](https://huyongfei.com/posts/2324b80c.html) # hexo ### HexoCDN ### Hexosource/imagesmarkdown ``` source/images/image.jpg ![()](/images/image.jpg) ``` ### images_config.yml ``` _config.yml post_asset_folder: true ``` _config.ymlpost_asset_foldertrue$ hexo new post_namesource/_posts post_name.mdpost_namepost_name ``` _posts/post_name/image.jpg ![](image.jpg) ``` markdown ``` _posts/post_name/image.jpg {% asset_img image.jpg This is an image %} ``` ### CDN CDN [Cloudinary](https://cloudinary.com/)CDNCloudinaryurl[](https://imgtu.com/) [![hVCDOI.png](https://z3.ax1x.com/2021/08/25/hVCDOI.png)](https://imgtu.com/i/hVCDOI) ### b ``` ``` **** ```
```

```

keytoolJDK

- -keysize 2048 2048
- -validity 3650 3650
- -keyalg RSA RSA
- -dname CN=myyiba.com Common Namemyyiba.com
- -keypass 123456 123456
- -storepass 123456 123456
- -keystore myyiba.jks  myyiba .jks

myyiba.jks/usr/local/server/project/resource/myyiba.jks

```
githubHttpServerInitializer
```

<!-- more -->

# SSLContext

```
keyStore ks = KeyStore.getInstance("JKS");
InputStream ksInputStream = new FileInputStream("/usr/local/server/project/resource/myyiba.jks");
ks.load(ksInputStream, "123456".toCharArray());
keyManagerFactory kmf = KeyManagerFactory.getInstance(KeyManagerFactory.getDefaultAlgorithm());
kmf.init(ks, "123456".toCharArray());
SSLContext sslContext = SSLContext.getInstance("TLS");
sslContext.init(kmf.getKeyManagers(), null, null);
```

try-catchsslContext

# ChannelInitializerinitChannel

```
@Override
protected void initChannel(SocketChannel socketChannel) throws Exception {
SSLEngine sslEngine = sslContext.createSSLEngine();
sslEngine.setUseClientMode(false); //
sslEngine.setNeedClientAuth(false); //
socketChannel.pipeline().addLast("ssl", new SslHandler(sslEngine)); //
//...
}
```

# jstatd

linux hostname -i  hostnameIP

ipjvisualvmip

vi /etc/hosts  

<!--more-->

jdkbin/usr/java/jdk1.8/bin/

jstatd.all.policy



grant codebase file:${java.home}/../lib/tools.jar {
permission java.security.AllPermission;
};

startJstatd.sh

\#!/bin/bash
nohup $JAVA_HOME/bin/jstatd -J-Djava.rmi.server.hostname=172.16.200.82 -p 1099 -J-Djava.security.policy=jstatd.all.policy -J-Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.authenticate=false -J-Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.ssl=false -J-Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.port=1199 &

-J-Djava.rmi.server.logCalls=true  

jstatd  jmxjstatdOJBK

linuxjstatd1099jvisualvm

# jmx

$JAVA_HOME/jre/lib/management/jmxremote.password.template,jmxremote.password,

chmod +w jmxremote.password  

jmxremote.passwrod

\#monitorRole QED#controlRole R&D monitorRole QED chmod 400 jmxremote.password JVMJAVA_PARAMS=$JAVA_PARAMS -Djava.rmi.server.hostname=47.95.10.167 -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.port=1199 -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.ssl=false -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.authenticate=trueOJBK

Post.title: JVM
Post._content:
Java

![JVM - 1  | ](https://i0.wp.com/192.144.167.243/blog/wp-content/uploads/cover-300x179.png?resize=300%2C179)

## goGitHub[QJvm](https://github.com/zhangga/QJvm)

## class[class](https://github.com/zxh0/classpy)ClasspyApp[](https://github.com/zxh0/jvmgo-book)

 <!-- more -->

# Class

![JVM - 2  | ](https://i2.wp.com/192.144.167.243/blog/wp-content/uploads/22.png?resize=640%2C484)





1.16cp_count

2.1cp_count-1

3.tag(8bit)

// 

const (

  CONSTANT_Class = 7

  CONSTANT_Fieldref = 9

  CONSTANT_Methodref = 10

  CONSTANT_InterfaceMethodref = 11

  CONSTANT_String = 8

  CONSTANT_Integer = 3

  CONSTANT_Float = 4

  CONSTANT_Long = 5

  CONSTANT_Double = 6

  CONSTANT_NameAndType = 12

  CONSTANT_Utf8 = 1

  CONSTANT_MethodHandle = 15

  CONSTANT_MethodType = 16

  CONSTANT_InvokeDynamic = 18

)

![JVM - 3  | ](https://i1.wp.com/192.144.167.243/blog/wp-content/uploads/23.png?resize=640%2C490)



|          |              |            | class                                                |
| ------------ | ---------------- | ---------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| numeric      |            | int/float/double     | tag(8bit)+()                                 |
| string       |        | string                 | tag(8bit)+utf8(16bit)                        |
| utf8         |            | string                 | tag(8bit)+length(16b)+bytes(length)                          |
| class        |            | class                  | tag(8bit)+utf8(16bit)                        |
| name&type    | () |  | tag(8bit)+name(16bit)+(16bit) |
| member       |          |  | tag(8bit)+class(16bit)+name&type(16bit)    |
| methodType   |          |                    | tag(8bit)+(16bit)                        |
| methodHandle |          |                | tag(8bit)+refKind(8b)+ref(16b)                 |

# Nexus

## 3.1nexus

3.X

https://www.sonatype.com/download-oss-sonatype

20183nexus-3.9.0-01-unix.tar.gz 

## 3.2

/opt/opt

```
cd /opt/scm
tar -xf ~/download/nexus-3.9.0-01-unix.tar.gz -C .
```



```
nexus-3.9.0-01
sonatype-work
```

## 3.3

### 3.3.1

![Nexus - 5  | ](https://i0.wp.com/common.cnblogs.com/images/copycode.gif?w=640&ssl=1)

```
vi /etc/systemd/system/nexus.service

[Unit]
Description=nexus service
After=network.target

[Service]Type=forking
LimitNOFILE=65536
ExecStart=/opt/scm/nexus-3.9.0-01/bin/nexus start
ExecStop=/opt/scm/nexus-3.9.0-01/bin/nexus stop
User=ansible
Restart=on-abort

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
```

![Nexus - 6  | ](https://i0.wp.com/common.cnblogs.com/images/copycode.gif?w=640&ssl=1)

### 3.3.2

```
sudo systemctl  daemon-reload
sudo systemctl start nexus.service
sudo systemctl status nexus.service
sudo systemctl enable nexus.service
```

1./etc/systemd/system/nexus.serviceuser
2./opt/scm/nexus/bin/nexus JAVA_HOME INSTALL4J_JAVA_HOME_OVERRIDE=/usr/local/java/jdk1.8/

[](https://www.cnblogs.com/fanzhenyong/p/7709434.html#_labelTop)

```



source ~/.bashrc

## 5.3

![Nexus - 16  | ](https://i0.wp.com/common.cnblogs.com/images/copycode.gif?w=640&ssl=1)

```
mvn -v

Picked up _JAVA_OPTIONS: -Xmx2048m -XX:MaxMetaspaceSize=512m -Djava.awt.headless=true
Apache Maven 3.5.0 (ff8f5e7444045639af65f6095c62210b5713f426; 2017-04-04T03:39:06+08:00)
Maven home: /home/ansible/tools/apache-maven-3.5.0
Java version: 1.8.0_102, vendor: Oracle Corporation
Java home: /usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.102-4.b14.el7.x86_64/jre
Default locale: en_US, platform encoding: UTF-8
OS name: "linux", version: "3.10.0-514.el7.x86_64", arch: "amd64", family: "unix"
```

## 5.4

vi ~/tools/apache-maven-3.5.0/conf/settings.xmllocalhostNexusIP

![Nexus - 17  | ](https://i0.wp.com/common.cnblogs.com/images/copycode.gif?w=640&ssl=1)

```
<settings>
  <pluginGroups>  
     <pluginGroup>org.sonatype.plugins</pluginGroup>  
  </pluginGroups> 
  <mirrors>
    <mirror>
      <id>nexus</id>
      <mirrorOf>*</mirrorOf>
      <url>http://localhost:8081/repository/maven-public/</url>
    </mirror>
  </mirrors>
  <profiles>
    <profile>
      <id>nexus</id>
      <!--Enable snapshots for the built in central repo to direct -->
      <!--all requests to nexus via the mirror -->
      <repositories>
        <repository>
          <id>central</id>
          <url>http://central</url>
          <releases><enabled>true</enabled></releases>
          <snapshots><enabled>true</enabled></snapshots>
        </repository>
      </repositories>
     <pluginRepositories>
        <pluginRepository>
          <id>central</id>
          <url>http://central</url>
          <releases><enabled>true</enabled></releases>
          <snapshots><enabled>true</enabled></snapshots>
        </pluginRepository>
      </pluginRepositories>
    </profile>
  </profiles>
  <activeProfiles>
    <!--make the profile active all the time -->
    <activeProfile>nexus</activeProfile>
  </activeProfiles>
  <servers>
    <server>
      <id>nexus</id>
      <username>admin</username>
      <password>admin123</password>
    </server>
  </servers>
</settings>
```

## 5.4

vi ~/tools/apache-maven-3.5.0/conf/settings.xmllocalhostNexusIP

![Nexus - 17  | ](https://i0.wp.com/common.cnblogs.com/images/copycode.gif?w=640&ssl=1)

```
<settings>
  <pluginGroups>  
     <pluginGroup>org.sonatype.plugins</pluginGroup>  
  </pluginGroups> 
  <mirrors>
    <mirror>
      <id>nexus</id>
      <mirrorOf>*</mirrorOf>
      <url>http://localhost:8081/repository/maven-public/</url>
    </mirror>
  </mirrors>
  <profiles>
    <profile>
      <id>nexus</id>
      <!--Enable snapshots for the built in central repo to direct -->
      <!--all requests to nexus via the mirror -->
      <repositories>
        <repository>
          <id>central</id>
          <url>http://central</url>
          <releases><enabled>true</enabled></releases>
          <snapshots><enabled>true</enabled></snapshots>
        </repository>
      </repositories>
     <pluginRepositories>
        <pluginRepository>
          <id>central</id>
          <url>http://central</url>
          <releases><enabled>true</enabled></releases>
          <snapshots><enabled>true</enabled></snapshots>
        </pluginRepository>
      </pluginRepositories>
    </profile>
  </profiles>
  <activeProfiles>
    <!--make the profile active all the time -->
    <activeProfile>nexus</activeProfile>
  </activeProfiles>
  <servers>
    <server>
      <id>nexus</id>
      <username>admin</username>
      <password>admin123</password>
    </server>
  </servers>
</settings>
```

/**

private final long windowInMs;
/**
 * 
 */
private final int threshold;
/**
 * 
 */
private long lastReqTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
/**
 * 
 */

    long now = System.currentTimeMillis();
    // 
    if (now - lastReqTime > windowInMs) {       #1
        counter = 0;
        lastReqTime = now;                  #2
    }
    if (counter < threshold) {                  #3
        counter++;                          #4
        return true;
    } else {
        return false;
    }
}

lua 

```
local tokens_key = KEYS[1]
local timestamp_key = KEYS[2]

local rate = tonumber(ARGV[1])
local capacity = tonumber(ARGV[2])
local now = tonumber(ARGV[3])
local requested = tonumber(ARGV[4])

local fill_time = capacity/rate
local ttl = math.floor(fill_time*2)

local last_tokens = tonumber(redis.call("get", tokens_key))
if last_tokens == nil then
  last_tokens = capacity
end

local last_refreshed = tonumber(redis.call("get", timestamp_key))
if last_refreshed == nil then
  last_refreshed = 0
end

local delta = math.max(0, now-last_refreshed)
local filled_tokens = math.min(capacity, last_tokens+(delta*rate))
local allowed = filled_tokens >= requested
local new_tokens = filled_tokens
if allowed then
  new_tokens = filled_tokens - requested
end

redis.call("setex", tokens_key, ttl, new_tokens)
redis.call("setex", timestamp_key, ttl, now)

return { allowed, new_tokens }
```

1. B+O(log<sub>d</sub><sup>N</sup>)(dB+, d100)O(N)d=100N=1O(log<sub>d</sub><sup>N</sup>) = 8, O(N)1

## MongoDB

###  Single Field Index

id

```
 # id field1-1
db.employee.createIndex({'id': 1})
```



MongoDB'_id' field'_id' fieldMongoDB'_id' field

###  (Compound Index)

![](https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/3959253-6b00f39c08c49406.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)useridscore 

#### field

1. MongoDBprefix

   ```
   db.collection.createIndex({'id': 1, 'city': 1, 'score': 1})
   ```



```
db.collection.find({'id': xxx})
db.collection.find({'id': xxx, 'city': xxx})

```

### key Multikey Index



```
{"name" : "jack", "age" : 19, habbit: ["football, runnning"]}
db.person.createIndex( {habbit: 1} )  // key
db.person.find( {habbit: "football"} )
```



### 

MongoDB

:

- uniquefieldfield

- partial

  ```
  db.restaurants.createIndex(
     { cuisine: 1, name: 1 },

  )
  ```



- sparsepartialMongoDB3.2partialpartial
- TTL 

# explain

IOIOMongoDBexplain

inventory collection

```
{ "_id" : 1, "item" : "f1", type: "food", quantity: 500 }
{ "_id" : 2, "item" : "f2", type: "food", quantity: 100 }
{ "_id" : 3, "item" : "p1", type: "paper", quantity: 200 }
{ "_id" : 4, "item" : "p2", type: "paper", quantity: 150 }
{ "_id" : 5, "item" : "f3", type: "food", quantity: 300 }
{ "_id" : 6, "item" : "t1", type: "toys", quantity: 500 }
{ "_id" : 7, "item" : "a1", type: "apparel", quantity: 250 }
{ "_id" : 8, "item" : "a2", type: "apparel", quantity: 400 }
{ "_id" : 9, "item" : "t2", type: "toys", quantity: 50 }
{ "_id" : 10, "item" : "f4", type: "food", quantity: 75 }
```





```
db.inventory.find( { quantity: { $gte: 100, $lte: 200 } } )
```





```
{ "_id" : 2, "item" : "f2", "type" : "food", "quantity" : 100 }
{ "_id" : 3, "item" : "p1", "type" : "paper", "quantity" : 200 }
{ "_id" : 4, "item" : "p2", "type" : "paper", "quantity" : 150 }
```



explain

```
# explain  "queryPlanner", "executionStats", and "allPlansExecution".
# "executionStats"
db.inventory.find(
   { quantity: { $gte: 100, $lte: 200 } }
).explain("executionStats")
```



explain

```
{
   "queryPlanner" : {
         "plannerVersion" : 1,
         ...
         "winningPlan" : {
            "stage" : "COLLSCAN",
            ...
         }
   },
   "executionStats" : {
      "executionSuccess" : true,
      "nReturned" : 3,  # document
      "executionTimeMillis" : 0, # 
      "totalKeysExamined" : 0, # key0
      "totalDocsExamined" : 10, # document10documents10
      "executionStages" : {
         "stage" : "COLLSCAN",  # "COLLSCAN"
         ...
      },
      ...
   },
   ...
}
```



"stage"stage"COLLSCAN"MongoDBstage

- COLLSCAN  Collection scan
- IXSCAN  Scan of data in index keys
- FETCH  Retrieving documents
- SHARD_MERGE  Merging results from shards
- SORT  Explicit sort rather than using index order



```
db.inventory.createIndex( { quantity: 1 } )
```



explain



```
db.inventory.find(
   { quantity: { $gte: 100, $lte: 200 } }
).explain("executionStats")
```





```
{
   "queryPlanner" : {
         "plannerVersion" : 1,
         ...
         "winningPlan" : {
               "stage" : "FETCH",
               "inputStage" : {
                  "stage" : "IXSCAN",  # "IXSCAN"
                  "keyPattern" : {
                     "quantity" : 1
                  },
                  ...

         },

   },

         "totalDocsExamined" : 3,
         "executionStages" : {
            ...
         },
         ...
   },
   ...
}
```

   },

}

Post.title: SVN/Git
Post._content:
## 

Windows10Office

[TortoiseSVN](https://osdn.net/projects/tortoisesvn/storage/1.14.1/Application/TortoiseSVN-1.14.1.29085-x64-svn-1.14.1.msi/)[TortoiseGit](https://tortoisegit.org/download/)

## 

****

bat

diff-xlsx-ssc.bat



<!-- more -->

```bash
@echo off

CHCP 65001

:: 
set ENV_PATH=%PATH%
@echo ====current environment
@echo %ENV_PATH%

:: 
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
set svnStr=SVN
set gitStr=Git
:: ENV_PATHsvnStrlens
call :getSubIndex ENV_PATH svnStr lensSvn
if "%lensSvn%"=="" (
	echo "SVN"
	goto :notSetSVN
) else (
	echo "TortoiseSVN"
)

:: svnjs
call :getLastIndex ENV_PATH lensSvn svnPath
set svnDiffPath="%svnPath%\Diff-Scripts\diff-xls.js"
echo %svnDiffPath%
call :writeJSFile svnDiffPath
echo "SVN"

:notSetSVN

call :getSubIndex ENV_PATH gitStr lensGit
if "%lensGit%"=="" (
	echo "Git"
) else (
	echo "TortoiseGit"
)

:: gitjs
call :getLastIndex ENV_PATH lensGit gitPath
set gitDiffPath="%gitPath%\Diff-Scripts\diff-xls.js"
echo %gitDiffPath%
call :writeJSFile gitDiffPath

echo "Git"

:notSetGit

pause

exit /b
:getLastIndex
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
set /A len+=%2
set value=
:strLen_LoopIndex
	set /A num=len-1
	if not "!%1:~%num%,1!"=="" (
		if "!%1:~%num%,1!"==";" (
			echo "%value%"
			endlocal & set %3=%value%
		) else (
			set /A len=len-1
			set value=!%1:~%num%,1!%value%
			goto :strLen_LoopIndex
		)
	) else (
		endlocal & set %3=%value%
	)
exit /b

exit /b
:getSubIndex
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
:strLen_Loop
    set /A len+=1

sNewDoc = objScript.GetAbsolutePathName(sNewDoc);
var sTempFolder = objScript.GetSpecialFolder(2)
var sTempFile = "D:\\temp.txt"
objScript = null;

var fs = new ActiveXObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject");

f.WriteLine(sBaseDoc)
f.WriteLine(sNewDoc)
f.close()
fs = null
f = null

  - (SYN)

    - 63(TIME_WAIT = 2*MSL)
    - [SYN flood](https://www.jianshu.com/p/6eae45826754)

<!--more-->

- 

  - TIME_WAIT
    - 2*MSLsudo sysctl -a | grep time_wait
    - TIME_WAIT
    - TIME_WAITTCP
  - 
    - UNIX[](https://jaminzhang.github.io/network/the-difference-between-unix-domain-socket-and-tcp-ip-socket/)TCP
    - sudo sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_tw_recycle = 1
    - sudo sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse = 1

- 

  - 
  - 
    - 
    - 
    - 
  - 
    - RTO(Retransmission TimeOut )
    - RTORTOtcp_retries2
    - [](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/25596865)3ACK
  - 
    - ACK
    - [](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/25596865)SACK

- 

  - 

    

    - [David D ClarkNagle](https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/)

  - Nagle + 

    Http ServerWrite-Write-Read40ms

    - TCP_NODELAYNagle

- Reno

  - 
    - RTTRound Trip TimeACK
    - RTORetransmission TimeRTTACK
  - 
    - RTTcwndACKRTTcwnd
    - cwndssthresh
  - 
    - 
      - RTOssthreshcwnd/2cwnd1
      - 3ACK
    - cwndssthresh
      - RTTcwndACK1/cwndMSSRTTcwnd1MSS
  - 
    - ssthreshcwnd/2cwndssthresh
  - 
    - cwndssthresh+3ACK
    - ACKcwnd
    - ACKcwndssthresh

#### TCP 

- setsockopt
  - SOL_SOCKET

- ```
  SO_KEEPALIVETCPtcp_keepalive_xxx
  
  SO_LINGERcloseFIN or RSTTIME_WAIT or not
  
  SO_RCVBUFtcp_rmem
  
  SO_SNDBUFtcp_wmem
  
  SO_REUSERADDR
  
      1. bind
  
      2. TIME_WAITsocket
  ```

  IPPROTO_TCP

- ```
  TCP_NODELAYNagle
  
  TCP_DEFER_ACCEPTLinux
  ```

  

  - ```
    net.ipv4.tcp_syn_retriessyn
    
    net.ipv4.tcp_synack_retriessyn+ack
    ```

    

  - ```
    
    
    netstat -s | grep LISTEN
    
    4375 SYNs to LISTEN sockets dropped
    
    
    
    
    
    net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlogSYN
    
    net.ipv4.tcp_syncookiesSYNsyncookiesSYNFlood
    ```

    

- ```
  
  
  netstat -s | grep listen
  
  22438 times the listen queue of a socket overflowed
  
  
  
  
  
  net.core.somaxconlisten()backlogaccept:min(backlog,somaxconn) 
  
  net.ipv4.tcp_abort_on_overflowaccept
  
      acceptACKRTOSYN+ACKnet.ipv4.tcp_synack_retries
  
      acceptRSTconnection reset by peer
  ```

  

- ```
  net.ipv4.tcp_wmem
  
  net.ipv4.tcp_rmem
  
  net.ipv4.tcp_moderate_rcvbuf
  ```

  

- ```
  net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_time
  
  net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_intvl
  
  net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_probes
  ```

  TIME_WAIT

- ```
  net.ipv4.tcp_max_tw_bucketsTIME_WAITsocket
  
  net.ipv4.tcp_tw_recycleTIME_WAITsocket
  
  net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuseTIME_WAITsocket
  
  net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_time_waitsocketTIME_WAIT
  ```

  

```

Post._content:
#### LinuxCPUCPU

```
#  = CPU X CPU 
# CPU = CPU X CPU X 

# CPU
cat /proc/cpuinfo| grep "physical id"| sort| uniq| wc -l

# CPUcore()
cat /proc/cpuinfo| grep "cpu cores"| uniq

# CPU
cat /proc/cpuinfo| grep "processor"| wc -l
```

#### CPU

```
cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep name | cut -f2 -d: | uniq -c
```

#### 

```
# cat /proc/meminfo
```

#### Linux 

```
uname -a
cat /proc/version
```

#### 

```
dmidecode | grep "Product Name"
dmidecode
```

#### linux 

```
cat /etc/redhat-release
lsb_release -a
cat /etc/issue
```

#### linuxCPU

```
cat /proc/cpuinfo

CPU
 processorCPU
 cpu cores
```

#### linux 

```
cat /proc/meminfo
```

#### tasksetCPU

```
CPUCPU0
[root@VM_32_4_centos ~]# taskset -c 0 ./test.sh&

test.shpid19155
[root@VM_32_4_centos ~]# ps aux|grep test.sh
root     19155  0.0  0.0 113120  1204 pts/3    S+   15:26   0:00 /bin/bash ./test.sh

CPU
[root@VM_32_4_centos ~]# taskset -p 19155
pid 19155's current affinity mask: 1
```
